cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Vizier of Air, arise. Your fingers are sacred swords.” 
—Hanusa, Radiance Elemental[/i]

[i]“What a spirit for such a skinny little thing.” 
—Brawler Zyler[/i]
[i]They can wait forever, for they know they will not die alone.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]“The world at peace? I'd rather see the world in pieces.”[/i]
[i]The first to the front lines are the first to taste victory.[/i]
[i]There is no sanctuary in the Fire Territory. Especially on the featureless, rocky plains. [/i]

[i]After it attacks, the lucky are left with 
rubble.[/i]
[i]They eat vegetarians.[/i]
[i]Liquid People freely control liquid. For them, water is armor and shield.[/i]

cards.card_name: UB0X Black Feather, Shadow of Rage

cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Fix it? That's easy. Just hit it.” 
— Legendary Artisan Picora[/i]
[i]“I wouldn't, if I were you. You don't want to get hurt.”[/i]
[i]Witness the power of whirling fire![/i]
[i]There's nothing a Machine Eater enjoys more than a good game of Whack-a-Hulcus.[/i]
[i]A Dragonoid's true home is the battlefield.[/i]
[i]“Any final words?”[/i]
[i]Those who leave the battle last are the ones who savor victory the longest.[/i]
[i]“You see? The one who wins is the one who has the bigger weapon.”[/i]
[i]They're bringing some friends to the party.[/i]
[i]The shining towers in the sky exist to protect the oracles.[/i]
[i]Flying is the greatest taboo of any race that has encountered the Guardians.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]This is light speed.[/i]
[i]Those who dwell in the sky towers eradicate all intruders.[/i]
[i]Like a whirlpool, it never seems to end.[/i]
[i]Witness the power of the Dark![/i]
[i]“You won't escape me!”[/i]
[i]Draglides grow with their mounts. Their bond is their weapon.[/i]
[i]Dragonoid fighters never retreat. They believe a heroic fighter will become a Dragon in his next life.[/i]

[i]“Time to move on. So many unexplored worlds, so much trash to find!”
— Nomad Hero Gigio[/i]
[i]“Though battered and scarred, I march on through wars, storms, and strife. I march on.”[/i]
[i]Hear the roar of the mighty Earth![/i]

Sacrifice Hanusa: Creatures you control gain indestructible, lifelink, and hexpoof until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The sky was scorched by Dragons' fire, and the earth gouged by elementals' rays. The battle raged for seven nights and seven days.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
When Urth enters, you may shield the top card of your library.
When Urth dies, you may look at any number of face-down shields you control. If any of them are creatures, you may turn them face up.

cards.flavor_text: [i]Even the smallest weapon attached to it has enough firepower to lay waste to an entire nation.[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]The forces of Fire will never relent.[/i]
[i]There is no rest in the Dark Realm, even after death.[/i]
[i]Dark Lords have no mercy for the weak.[/i]
[i]A beautiful flower, an alluring scent...and deadly thorns. [/i]
[i]Not many things want to get in its way.[/i]
[i]Long ago, the Cyber Lords built a city on his back.[/i]
[i]If the last thing you want to see in your life is something beautiful, attack an underwater city.[/i]
[i]Those who defile the Sky Castle are doomed, for they shall know the wrath of the Guardians.[/i]
[i]The Enforcers deliver the oracles' words, which bear the power of truth.[/i]

While you have one or more shields, you do not lose the game for having 0 or less life.

[i]It looks like a hideous monster, but there's really a sweet little girl deep down inside. In its stomach.[/i]
